summary: This bill, the National Earthquake Hazards Reduction Program Reauthorization Act of 2025, reauthorizes and amends the Earthquake Hazards Reduction Act of 1977. It focuses on improving the National Earthquake Hazards Reduction Program (NEHRP) by updating program activities, clarifying duties of the Interagency Coordinating Committee, modifying the advisory committee, and specifying responsibilities of the United States Geological Survey (USGS). It also authorizes appropriations for the program for fiscal years 2026-2030, with a focus on completing the Advanced National Seismic System.
